privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We value your privacy. Learn how your personal data is processed.

section1.title: Our Privacy Commitment
section1.content: As Jizayn, we take all necessary technical and administrative measures to protect the privacy and security of your personal data. Your personal data is processed only in accordance with the stated purposes.

section2.title: Information Collected
section2.content: When you use our website, place an order, or contact us, personal information such as name, surname, email address, phone number, address information, and order details are collected.

section3.title: Use of Information
section3.content: The personal information collected is used to process your orders, provide customer service, improve our products and services, fulfill our legal obligations, and offer you special offers.

section4.title: Information Security
section4.content: We take measures such as SSL encryption, secure payment systems, and regular security audits to ensure the security of your personal data.

section5.title: Cookies
section5.content: Cookies are used on our website to improve user experience and analyze website traffic. For detailed information, you can review our Cookie Policy.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our privacy policy, you can send an email to info@jizayn.com or contact us.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Information about our cookie policy and how to manage your preferences.

section1.title: What are Cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files that are saved to your device when you visit websites. Cookies ensure that our website functions properly and improve the user experience.

section2.title: Types of Cookies
section2.content: Our website uses necessary cookies, performance cookies, and analytical cookies. Necessary cookies are required for the website to function, while other cookies are used to improve user experience.

section3.title: Cookie Management
section3.content: You can manage, delete, or block cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling some cookies may cause some features of the website to not work.

section4.title: Third-Party Cookies
section4.content: Our website uses cookies from third-party services such as Google Analytics. These cookies are used to analyze website traffic and understand user behavior.

kvkk.title: Data Protection
kvkk.description: Information within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law.

section1.title: Data Controller
section1.content: In accordance with Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("KVKK"), your personal data is processed by Jizayn as the data controller. This Information Notice has been prepared to inform you about the processing of your personal data.

section2.title: Processed Personal Data
section2.content: When you visit our website, place an order, or contact us, your personal data (name, surname, email, phone, address, etc.) is collected and processed.

section3.title: Purposes of Processing Personal Data
section3.content: Your personal data is processed for the purposes of providing our products and services, processing your orders, providing customer service, fulfilling our legal obligations, and conducting marketing activities.

section4.title: Transfer of Personal Data
section4.content: Your personal data may be transferred to authorized public institutions and organizations when necessary to fulfill our legal obligations in line with the purposes stated above.

section5.title: Rights of the Data Subject
section5.content: In accordance with Article 11 of the KVKK, you have the right to learn whether your personal data is being processed, to request information if processed, to learn the purpose of processing and whether it is used in accordance with its purpose, to know the third parties to whom it is transferred domestically or abroad, and to request correction if incomplete or incorrectly processed, or deletion or destruction.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights under the KVKK, you can send an email to info@jizayn.com or submit a written application.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Rules and conditions you must follow while using our website.

section1.title: General Provisions
section1.content: These terms of use apply when using the Jizayn website. By using the site, you are deemed to have accepted these terms. If you do not accept the terms, please leave the site.

section2.title: Services and Products
section2.content: Jizayn offers handmade wooden decorative products. Product images and descriptions are for informational purposes. Actual products may show minor differences from images.

section3.title: Orders and Payment
section3.content: Your orders are processed after confirmation. Payment information is processed securely. Prices may vary and orders may be cancelled based on stock availability.

section4.title: Delivery and Returns
section4.content: Delivery times may vary depending on product and location. If products arrive damaged or incomplete, please contact us within 7 days of the delivery date.

section5.title: Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content, design, logos, and trademarks on the website belong to Jizayn and are protected by copyright. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
